<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Connection statistics</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/mt/monitor/v1/interconnect/monitor/connections/connectionStats"}></MethodEndpoint>



Offers detailed metrics on the performance and realibity of a network connection.
